name: Specification/Control Documents - Scope of works, Customer order, Client supplied drawings, Precast shop drawings, Lifting design drawings

2 - Certification of lifting points/ cast in items

Acceptance Criteria - All materials to be new and free of defects. All materials to have manufacturer/supplier test certificates supplied.

Acceptance Criteria - Concrete Mix design meets requirement

Acceptance Criteria - Drawings are available, bars placed as  shown on MJB Production Drawing.
Acceptance Criteria - Formwork is suitable for surface finish. Dimensions checked in accordance with MJB production drawings.
Acceptance Criteria - Applied prior to pouring
Acceptance Criteria - Cover and location of reinforcement checked.
8 - Installation of cast-in items (Lifting Pins, Ferrules etc)
Acceptance Criteria - Cover and location of cast-in items checked.
Acceptance Criteria - Compressive strength test. Minimum 28 day compressive strength for S50 is 58 MPa, Slump and. Slump 120mm +- 20mm
Verifying Documents - Every 20m3 concrete batch. Every 20m3 concrete batch.
Acceptance Criteria - Correct concrete supplied, Concrete temperature between 10-32 degrees Celsius at discharge. Freefall distance less than 2m
Acceptance Criteria - Finish level to be trowelled as per AS 3610
Acceptance Criteria - Dimensions, lifting points and visual appearance are correct and within tolerance
Acceptance Criteria - All precast concrete cured by Master Builders Solutions Masterkure CC 100WB
Repairs (if required) and storage of product
Acceptance Criteria - Identify defects, complete repairs with the correct method.
15 - Final inspection and storage of items
